name: Sumatran Laughingthrush
description: It has a dark brown body, white head and neck, a black beak, and black areas around the eyes and on the forehead.
food_note: Insects including beetles, other invertebrates, berries, seeds
attractions: There is no information from the wild.
projects_note: It’s threatened primarily by hunting (trapping) and illegal trade to breeders, making it vulnerable on the IUCN Red List.
breeding: In 2008, we imported a pair from Plzeň and a female from Augsburg. She and the male became the founders of our breeding program and still live here, as does their first successfully raised chick from 2010.
